name: ClownPanic
description:
ClownPanic

A game created in Godot as part of the Go Godot 3 Classic 2022 Game Jam with the theme of EVOLUTION.

ClownPanic is a puzzle game where the player has to search for and delete the virus that has infected this system. Every time you delete the virus it evolves into a greater threat, hiding more within the file system.

There are many secrets to uncover within ClownPanic that may only be visible upon closer inspection.

Source Code: https://github.com/EmreDogann/ClownPanic

Controls and Objective:

The objective is to find and delete the virus, which will become increasingly difficult as the game progresses.

The player can navigate the file system with both keyboard and mouse. You can delete the virus by pressing 'delete' either on the keyboard or in the UI.

'Escape' will pause the game and allow you to quit.

There are many hints that will lead you closer to the virus, however, you have to figure them out yourself :)

Disclaimer

The game will read a limited portion of the user's file system, however, it does NOT delete, modify or create any files. This game is also disconnected from the internet, so no data will be shared.

Created by:
  • Emre Dogan
  • Aum Patel
